episode_summary: This episode of "No Such Thing As A Fish" covers a variety of quirky and intriguing topics, including the dangers of Christmas for German penises, the massive value of goods returned in the US, a man with a passion for bananas, and the concept of neo-toddlerism as a form of protest.

facts.fact: My fact this week is that Christmas is a very dangerous time for German penises.
My fact this week is that the value of goods Americans refund each year is more than the GDP of 90% of the world's countries.
My fact is there is a man in America who has tasted 500 kinds of banana and claims he has special banana eyes.
My fact this week is that neo toddlerism is the idea that you can change the world by acting like a three year old.
